displaytitle: Centaur and Satyr Couple at Play
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and grey-brown wash over traces of black chalk
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
signed: Signed in brown ink, lower left: Dom. Tiepolo f.

texts.textentryhtml:
V. A. Heck, Vienna;

1936, bought by Dan Fellows Platt;

bequested to Princeton University Art Museum

bibliography.boilertext: George Knox, "Drawings by Giambattista and Domenico Tiepolo at Princeton", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 23, no. 1 (1964): p. 2-28.
bibliography.citation: George Knox, "Drawings by Giambattista and Domenico Tiepolo at Princeton", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 23, no. 1 (1964): p. 2-28., p. 27, no. 77; p. 20 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Adelheid M. Gealt and George Knox, Domenico Tiepolo: master draftsman, (Milano: Electa, 1996).
bibliography.citation: Adelheid M. Gealt and George Knox, Domenico Tiepolo: master draftsman, (Milano: Electa, 1996)., p. 87; cat. no. 125; p. 191 (color illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: "Centaurs, Fauns, Female Fauns, and Satyrs among the Drawings of Domenico Tiepolo", L' art du dix-huitième siècle, in The Burlington magazine 116, no. 855 (Jun., 1974): p. i-xxviii.
bibliography.citation:
"Centaurs, Fauns, Female Fauns, and Satyrs among the Drawings of Domenico Tiepolo", L' art du dix-huitième siècle, in The Burlington magazine 116, no. 855 (Jun., 1974): p. i-xxviii.

, cat. no. 67; p. xxi, fig. 61

bibliography.citation: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977)., Vol. 1: p. 206, no. 673 (illustrated in Vol. 2 under the same catalog number)

caption: Domenico Tiepolo (Italian, 1727–1804), Centaur and Satyr Couple at Play, 1760s?. Pen and brown ink and brush and grey-brown wash over traces of black chalk; 19.2 × 27 cm, 41.9 × 54.6 × 2.9 cm (frame). Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-902)
